name: Untitled Catformer
description:
There are some cats, and maybe also mice.

Here's a very basic platformer starring you, the kitten. More mechanics / story / everything else to come, I'll update the page as I update the game. I'll add an OSX download when it's all finished, too.

A + D / Left + Right - Move
W / Up / Space - Jump
Escape - Quit game

Initial upload (4 April 1:14 am):

  • Got basic movement mechanics working, that's pretty much it
  • Made initial test sprite for the cat, and some boring blue boxes for her to jump around on
